short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For teaching and playback, hide elements such as moves, result, ratings and usernames.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As I was teaching chess, the kids were looking at the side at the moves and other things that I would have rather hidden, so I made this extension for lichess to hide the moves.
